game_description: * Dual Controller or Dual Hand/Finger control operation. * Seamlessly switch between hands and controllers (with a hardware delay). * Play reclined or laying down! Or upside down. Any position, any space. * Environmental features such as snow, falling leaves, fireflies, and bubbles. Seriously, try the bubbles. * Listen to various audio tracks including a gentle Mozart piece, a Sousa March, and Wagner's Ride of the Valkyries, adjustable volumes for music and fireworks. * Set the weather and the Speed of Time. Note, the weather has a mind of its own. * Show and hide individual UI components or enter the VOID, with all aim assistance turned off.
review_1: I love fireworks and this really gives me the feeling that I just watched some when I use this app. The reason for four stars instead of five is the annoying bubbles that fly back toward you as you shoot a firework off. There should be a setting to turn that off. There is a laser setting which I turn off, but it doesn't change anything in the app. Please put in a setting to shut off the bubbles that are shooting toward your face with each new firework as then I can give you the five stars this deserves.
review_2: A nice VR game. Light entertainment :-) However, where do I fnd the 'Exit' button - the only way I can shut this is to power down my headset?
review_3: First, thank you developers for this lovely VR game. I enjoyed it very much. It is simple, colorful and good effects to feel joyful and happy same time. If possible, Allow user to import 360 photos to use as background environment inside this VR game. Because with many different background environments to improve the game play. Also allow more different colors of fire works if good idea. Yes, I do recommend this game for everyone to enjoy. Thank you.
